name: TicTacToe (Work_)
description:
My first game created with Godot. Had plenty of help from a friend of mine.

Took about a day and a half to complete.  

Wanted to go for the GameBoy retro style and the 8-bit sound.

Feedback is welcome :D

Comment if you were able to get a draw without trying ^^

ps. repo is public here https://github.com/kyodaii/this-is-tictactoe
